Title: Sleepy Hollow
Writer: Washington Irving (story "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow"), Kevin Yagher (screen story), Andrew Kevin Walker (screen story), Andrew Kevin Walker (screenplay)
Actors: Johnny Depp, Christina Ricci, Miranda Richardson, Michael Gambon
Plot: The curse of the headless horseman is the legacy of the small town of Sleepy Hollow. Spearheaded by the eager Constable Ichabod Crane and his new world ways into the quagmire of secrets and murder, secrets once laid to rest, best forgotten and now reawakened, and he too, holding a dark secret of a past once gone.
Production: Mandalay Pictures, Paramount Pictures, American Zoetrope, Scott Rudin Productions
